Articles.Content:
Hi all, recently I found a very cool mod about Spaceplane parts expansion , I found the cockpit looks like the SR-71 Blackbird's cockpit, so I decide to make a SR-71 replica.

It is a SSTO plane, with 6 crew capacity. Also it have a cargo bay.

I haven't use the kerbpaint mod, that why I call it white bird

Javascript is disabled. View full album

White Bird can full throttle in jet mode below 29km, the jet limit is about 32~34km.

Action Group:

1 : Switch engine mode

5 : Toggle ladder

8 : Toggle cargo bay

0 : Toggle docking port cover

Mod required:

Spaceplane Plus

Any fuel balancing mod (optional, can replace by adding a pair of fuel pipe)

Download
imho the cockpit looks more like a xb 70 valkyrie, so try to build one =)
That looks great. Nice lines. I'm always trying to do one of these but it never comes out just right.
I can't download it if it has landing gear. One of my other mods seems to conflict with it...

I can't download it if it has landing gear. One of my other mods seems to conflict with it...

No gear (yet, sadly). just fuselages, cargo bays, wings, intakes, and control surfaces (for now).

I can't download it if it has landing gear. One of my other mods seems to conflict with it...

White Bird use stock gear

White Bird use stock gear

I have many, many mods...
